name: Chemionix e-Solutions Pvt Ltd
overview:
We are leading Engineering & CAD outsourcing company service provider based in Mumbai - India offering wide range of CAD design, drafting & Engineering services. Over 400+ projects completed our experienced Engineers & CAD designer resources supported with world class infrastructure provide a comprehensive range for CAD design & drafting services for wide spectrum of Industry. Contact Us for outsourcing your Cad drafting services & save upto 50% on your project cost. We will provide the Cad services which meets your international quality standard.

Engineering Design Services We offer wide spectrum of basic & detail Engineering design services like Preparing Intelligent P&ID, PFD, Piping design services for 3D modeling, Piping Isometrics, Layouts, Mechanical Desing & drafting for equipments, Layouts, Piping GA drawings. Electrical & Instrumentation Outsourcing services like Preparing SLD, Load list, MCC specifications, Cable tray layouts, BOM, Loop Diagrams, Instrument block diagrams etc..

Architectural Design Services We provide Architectural 2d Drafting, Architectural 3d Modeling, Architectural Rendering, Animation & Walkthrough, Interior and Exterior Modeling, 2d and 3d Floor Plan services. This helps our clients to move from paper to the world of 3D visualization.

MEP Design Services We are leading MEP Design outsourcing service provider firm designing projects across the globe. We provide high quality and precision MEP design services, Like ducting workshop drawings, Duct sizes & layout, HVAC CAD design, Fire fighting design schematic as per NFPA standard, Fire hydrant system design, Smoke detector & alarm systems design, Electrical design for Building services.

Software Migrations Services CAD Outsourcing helps you significantly reduce time, cost and errors associated with re-keying data from one system to another. Our company provides very accurate and cost-effective paper to CAD conversion services like Paper to CAD, Microstation to CAD, From CAD To Revit, etc..

Contact us for working on your Engineering & CAD Design Project.
